parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Flags

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the original flag pole of the flag the unit is carrying.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[flag]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Object]] - Flag pole object the flag belongs to. If the unit carries no flag, [[objNull]] is returned.
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_flag = [[flag]] _soldier;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[flagOwner]], [[setFlagOwner]], [[setFlagSide]], [[setFlagTexture]], [[flagSide]], [[flagTexture]], [[setFlagAnimationPhase]], [[flagAnimationPhase]], [[forceFlagTexture]], [[getForcedFlagTexture]], [[Flag Textures]]
</value></part></template>
